item.title: F# by example: FizzBuzz Kata
item.description: Last Tuesday I started a book club with my friends Samir Talwar and Pedro Moreira Santos (both of them working at Codurance). The book we've choseen is "The book of F#", because we want to learn F#. After reading the first three chapters we decided to make the FizzBuzz kata to start practicing. In this article I'm going to explain you how we solved the kata trying to explain all the F# syntax we use.
